Reviews.Title: “Nothing fancy, close to station, perfect for us!”
Reviews.Author: Amy D
Reviews.Content: literally streets train station stayed floor lift cleaned daily checkout 11am breakfast included special croissants bread rolls cereal juice toast eggs yoghurt fruit ive seen staff helpful information venice spoke english comfortable free wifi fancy definitely stay close station

Reviews.Content: star hotel classic italian plumbing water neighbour showering barely bed english channels tv convenient location pleasant staff cleanliness happy

Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights hotel florida overall experience looking inexpensive hotel hard venice hotel florida 1 alley train station location didnt drag luggage vaparettos water taxis stop 12 block fairly congested hotel building elevator luggage getting bags narrow stairs bit wed expected front desk manned 24 hours free wi fi 2nd floor appreciated 8 2 3 1 double bit clean bathrooms retiled recently nice showers plenty hot water hot sept ac left windows closed view hotel ok breakfast tiny included cost breakfast stop couple afternoons buy cold coffee pretty terrible breakfast roll yogurt corner restaurant brek cappuchino fresh crossants mornings crossant sprinkles filled lady front desk helpful getting taxi morning departed airport 6 am water taxi couldnt agree pick 530 am van driver arrangement train station drove little electric buggy pick luggage followed gate train station taxi waited didnt drag luggage bridge taxi parking lot pricey actually worth

Reviews.Content: hotel florida nice stay venice convenient location near train bus stations vaporetto helps maximize time visit staff friendly knowledgeable helped gondolier night venice breakfast caffe latte cappucino excellent church nearby rings bells 715am enjoy venices sites culture sleep late

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location - better than the external look”

Reviews.Content: stayed days week closest cheap hotel sta lucia train station narrow quiet street triple windows newish noise night hotel look outside inside ok venice meaning overpriced triple double bed inbuilt folding bed bathroom newly redone painting recent bfast buffet basic service nice 2star merited

Reviews.Title: “compact and comfortable”

Reviews.Content: hotel clean compfortable basic breakfast close main station venice walked piazza san marco venice downside narrow street outside window sometimes noisy price reasonable compared available hotels

Reviews.Title: “A brilliant little gem”

Reviews.Content: hotel perfect location couple minutes main bridge mainland venice close water bus station clean recently refurbished double bed singles pushed beds comfortable cleaned daily stayed 5 nights linen changed regularly breakfast ok healthy dose carbs issue air conditioning told controlled changes

Reviews.Title: “Perfect stay”
Reviews.Author: MarianaMatos
Reviews.Content: hotel florida provided husband nice stay venice ive booked reservation paying advance rates definitely dont regret hotel close bus stop foot easy prefer walk heavy bags theres bridge steps crossing chanel easy vaporetto leaves front hotel street arrived walked 1015 minutes leaved vaporetto 5 minutes bed clean tidy breakfast wifi wasnt supposed staff gentle speak english id definitely recomend

Reviews.Content: location beds pretty hard rate slept loved bathroom huge deep tub wifi skype free breakfast simple free clean air conditioner cool staff staff inflexible late check 30 mins sitting breakfast time using internet breakfast star expect

Reviews.Content: recommended friend found hotel florida convenient comfortable worth upgrade superior fine friends mattress maybe hadnt gotten staff helpful knowledgeable willing spend time answering endless questions excellent breakfasts glad stayed

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Surprise”
